column2: "Considering how the Tunnels was just discovered, there's bound to be people who get too bold and end up in trouble."
"And guess who's going to go rushing off to save them? I think you see my point."
"That's why I want to make a preliminary assessment of the place. But I'm not so sure I want to go alone. Can I count on you?"
"Going with Zeno is out of the question! I mean if he found I was doing this, I'd… well… I'd probably die of embarrassment."
"Oh, why I am I talking about this? Well, come on, let's go!"
